Starshine Skullcap

helmet (lvl 6)

item id [id]: 188
armor id [armor]: 83 (Starshine Skullcap)
protection, head [prothead]: 8
magic bonus [boosters]: +S
magic resistance [mr]: +2

Requires 10S to forge (S2)

This skullcap is enchanted with pure Astral light, which gives it an eerie glow. When worn, it will be easier to cast Astral magic and resist hostile spells.
